Name: A Sinking Cocktail
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist and strawberry.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over cocktail and use a garnish along with a strawberry on rim.
Review: Copper red and bitter sweet with wine, elderflower and a touch of cherry liqueur.
History: Created in 2009 by Rich Hunt at Quo Vadis, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of A Sinking Cocktail contains 167 calories
